sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const MentorsSection: React.FC = () => { const [scrollProgress, setScrollProgress] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const section = document.getElementById('mentors-section'); if (section) { const rect = section.getBoundingClientRect(); const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; const sectionHeight = rect.height; // Calculate progress based on section visibility and scroll position if (rect.top <= windowHeight && rect.bottom >= 0) { // Section is visible in viewport // Calculate how much of the section has been scrolled through // Progress starts when section enters viewport and completes when section exits viewport const sectionEntryPoint = windowHeight - rect.top; const totalScrollDistance = sectionHeight + windowHeight; // Ensure progress reaches 100% when bottom of section reaches top of viewport let scrollProgress = sectionEntryPoint / totalScrollDistance; // Clamp between 0 and 1 scrollProgress = Math.max(0, Math.min(1, scrollProgress)); // Additional check: if we're at the bottom of the page, ensure 100% const documentHeight = document.documentElement.scrollHeight; const currentScroll = window.pageYOffset + windowHeight; if (currentScroll >= documentHeight - 10) { scrollProgress = 1; } setScrollProgress(scrollProgress); } else if (rect.bottom < 0) { // Section has passed completely setScrollProgress(1); } else { // Section hasn't entered viewport yet setScrollProgress(0); } } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); handleScroll(); // Initial call return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (

Author of 4 books & 3 educational programs on AI adoption.

Advisor to tech firms & academic programs.

Influenced global AI policy (European AI Alliance).

Co-launched the International AI Directory.

); }; export default MentorsSection;
